segment.source: Manage settings and access to apps in Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Manage settings and access to apps in Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Manage access to private store
segment.target: Manage access to private store

segment.source: You can manage access to your private store in Store for Business.
segment.target: You can manage access to your private store in Store for Business.

segment.source: App inventory managemement for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: App inventory managemement for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: You can manage all apps that you've acquired on your Inventory page.
segment.target: You can manage all apps that you've acquired on your Inventory page.

segment.source: Manage private store settings
segment.target: Manage private store settings

segment.source: The private store is a feature in the Store for Business that organizations receive during the sign up process.
segment.target: The private store is a feature in the Store for Business that organizations receive during the sign up process.

segment.source: When admins add apps to the private store, all employees in the organization can view and download the apps.
segment.target: When admins add apps to the private store, all employees in the organization can view and download the apps.

segment.source: Only online-licensed apps can be distributed from your private store.
segment.target: Only online-licensed apps can be distributed from your private store.

segment.source: Configure MDM provider
segment.target: Configure MDM provider

segment.source: For companies or organizations using mobile device management (MDM) tools, those tools can synchronize with Store for Business inventory to manage apps with offline licenses.
segment.target: For companies or organizations using mobile device management (MDM) tools, those tools can synchronize with Store for Business inventory to manage apps with offline licenses.

segment.source: Store for Business management tool services work with your third-party management tool to manage content.
segment.target: Store for Business management tool services work with your third-party management tool to manage content.
